name: Deepwood Memories
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Dendro Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#99FF88FF>Dendro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#99FF88FF>Dendro Dice</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

storytitle: Knowledge of the Vine: Deepwood Memories
storytext: "For all those who follow nature must pass through the maze of the forest and reach that endless plain."
